abstract: Hewlett-Packard announced Wednesday afternoon that it would acquire the networking equipment company 3Com for about $2.7 billion in cash.
snippet: Hewlett-Packard announced Wednesday afternoon that it would acquire the networking equipment company 3Com for about $2.7 billion in cash.
lead_paragraph: Update | 5:41 p.m. The New York Times’s Steve Lohr has more details on Hewlett-Packard‘s deal for 3Com.
